tool_description: Get data from the Anime News Network Encyclopedia in XML format.
name: Anime News Network Encyclopedia
title: Anime News Network Encyclopedia

api_list.name: Reports

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the report to display; list of available reports is at http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/reports.php

optional_parameters.name: nlist
optional_parameters.description: limit number of results in the report

optional_parameters.name: nskip
optional_parameters.description: skip the the first N items in the report

api_list.name: Anime/Manga Details
